ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC
“SANCTUARY,” Part One
No and company have found a place where civilization seems to have survived and where safety can be found. Is it too good to be true?
Starting this issue: a special 4-part series of interlocking covers by series co-creator KYLE STRAHM!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Kyle Strahm & Felipe Sobreiro | 1 | | B | Cover B | John Bivens & Felipe Sobreiro | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Sanctuary Part One
